content.question: Using the data, calculate the growth rate in <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>c</mi> <mi>e</mi> <mi>l</mi> <mi>l</mi> <mi>s</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>m</mi> <mi>L</mi> <mo>×</mo> <mi>h</mi> <mi>o</mi> <mi>u</mi> <mi>r</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45C2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> of the bacterial population between hours 2 and 4.
